GASHAPON_OFFICIAL_SITE.title: GASHAPON OFFICIAL SITE
GASHAPON_OFFICIAL_SITE.description: We developed a feature that allows you to easily find out which stores sell the Gashapon you want and how much stock is left from the map on our website.

GASHAPON_ONLINE.title: GASHAPON ONLINE
GASHAPON_ONLINE.description: "Gashapon Online" is a service that allows you to purchase Gashapon products anytime, 24/7, from your PC or smartphone. You can turn the Gashapon machine and open the capsule to see what you get on the spot. You can also enjoy exclusive online lottery screens and sound effects.
